stanza.line: In faith I do not love thee with mine eyeseyes
For they in thee a thousand errors notenote
But tis my heart that loves what they despisedespise
Who in despite of view is pleased to dotedote
Nor are mine cars with thy tongue tune delighteddelighted
Nor tender feeling to base touches proneprone
Nor taste nor smell desire to be invitedinvited
To any sensual feast with thee alonealone
But my five wits nor my five senses cancan
Dissuade one foolish heart from serving theethee
Who leaves unswayed the likeness of a manman
Thy proud heart slave and vassal wretch to bebe
Only my plague thus far I count my gaingain
That she that makes me sin awards me painpain
